name: They Keep Coming!
description:
“They Keep Coming!” is a top down survival shooter game. You are spawned in a “out of control” scenario where the only survival option is to kill the enemies, but here comes the twist! The enemy killed will split into two and furthermore. So basically, the more you kill the more enemies’ spawns. Made for GMTK 2020. 

 

Made by: Developer: Madhu Kumar

Music By: Avinash Rao 

 Game UI Art: Sachin Singh 

 Game Design & Environment: Sachin Kumar

Controls: 

 W, A,S, D / arrow keys  to move 

 Left mouse – to shoot

 Mouse – rotation
